results.idea: Short-term momentum: 5-day returns z-scored cross-sectionally
results.description: Used SUGGESTION1 by combining returns and volume fields. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: if coverage <0.6, apply ts_backfill to returns; noted but dataset not provided here. SUGGESTION4: prefer high userCount/alphaCount fields for returns/volume — applied when selecting fields. Confidence set to 0.70 because short-term momentum is well-established but sensitive to microstructure.

results.idea: Mean-reversion: price deviation from 20-day moving average
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine price and volatility proxy. SUGGESTION2: no vector fields. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill if MA has gaps. SUGGESTION4: choose price (high userCount). Confidence 0.65 — classic mean-reversion short-term signal with moderate reliability.

results.idea: Volatility breakout: realized vol spike vs 60-day baseline
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used returns and ts_std_dev. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns if sparse. SUGGESTION4: returns have high userCount. Confidence 0.60 — breakouts can lead to trend but noisy.
results.implementation: quantile( divide( ts_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,1),10 ), ts_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,1),60 ) ) )

results.idea: Volume-confirmed momentum: 10-day return scaled by 10-day volume z-score
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine returns and volume. SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill volume if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: prefer volume field with many users. Confidence 0.66 — momentum stronger when accompanied by high relative volume.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum: post-earnings return acceleration
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine earnings surprise and short-term returns. SUGGESTION2: no vectors. SUGGESTION3: apply ts_backfill to surprise if sparse. SUGGESTION4: use widely-used earnings surprise field. Confidence 0.62 — earnings surprises tend to move prices but fade.

results.idea: Analyst revision momentum: change in consensus estimate vs price
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine analyst estimate change and returns. SUGGESTION2: no. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill estimate changes if sparse. SUGGESTION4: prefer consensus fields with higher alphaCount. Confidence 0.63 — revisions often precede price moves.

results.idea: Implied vs realized vol divergence: positive IV skew predicts mean reversion
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine IMPLIED_VOL and realized vol. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: backfill IV if needed. SUGGESTION4: use IV if widely available. Confidence 0.58 — option-based signals can be informative but sparse.

results.idea: Liquidity pullback: price drop with declining liquidity suggests overshoot
results.description: Combined price return and liquidity proxy per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill liquidity if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: use high userCount liquidity fields. Confidence 0.55 — liquidity signals are useful but noisy.

results.idea: Cross-sectional reversal: prior-month losers outperform next month
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use 20-day return and 60-day return; combine. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns if sparse. SUGGESTION4: returns high userCount. Confidence 0.67 — well-documented reversal effect over medium horizon.

results.idea: Seasonality — month-of-year effect: rank by historical average monthly returns
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine historical monthly avg and recent returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill historical if sparse. SUGGESTION4: use monthly return fields with broad coverage. Confidence 0.45 — seasonality exists but is low edge.

results.idea: Price-turnover signal: high turnover with price appreciation continues
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine recent returns and turnover. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill turnover. SUGGESTION4: prefer turnover fields with high usage. Confidence 0.59 — liquidity-confirmed trends often persist.

results.idea: High short interest rebound: stocks with large short interest that stabilize
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine short interest and recent return improvement. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill short interest if coverage<0.6. SUGGESTION4: short interest fields often lower coverage — accounted. Confidence 0.50 — contingent on borrow dynamics.

results.idea: Earnings revision surprise: analyst upward revisions + rising price momentum
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1: combine ESTIMATE_CHANGE and short-term returns. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: backfill ESTIMATE_CHANGE if sparse. SUGGESTION4: use consensus estimate fields with decent coverage. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Dividend-adjusted momentum: returns excluding dividend days to avoid noise
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine PRICE returns and DIVIDEND indicator. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill dividend info if sparse. SUGGESTION4: dividends widely tracked. Confidence 0.52 — minor improvement in momentum clarity.

results.idea: Cross-asset beta rotation: low-beta stocks outperform when market volatility rises
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine historical beta and volatility change. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill beta. SUGGESTION4: beta fields commonly used. Confidence 0.56 — macro regime dependent.
results.implementation: quantile( multiply( inverse(BETA), ts_delta( ts_std_dev( ts_returns(MKT,1),30 ), 1 ) ) )

results.idea: Price-to-earnings momentum: flow into low PE with rising earnings revisions
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine PE and ESTIMATE_CHANGE. SUGGESTION2: not used. SUGGESTION3: backfill PE if sparse. SUGGESTION4: use PE with high userCount. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Cross-sectional volatility scaling: favor high return per unit vol
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine returns and volatility measure. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill vol if coverage low. SUGGESTION4: returns/vol are common. Confidence 0.68 — Sharpe-style metric effective cross-sectionally.

results.idea: Breakout confirmed by increasing intraday range
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine intraday range vector and returns. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_avg on intraday range vector if available. SUGGESTION3: backfill intraday if sparse. SUGGESTION4: intraday vectors may have lower userCount; noted. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum with volatility targeting: scale momentum by inverse recent vol
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum and vol. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill vol if needed. SUGGESTION4: use widely available fields. Confidence 0.66 — volatility scaling improves risk-adjusted returns.
results.implementation: quantile( multiply( ts_returns(PRICE,10), inverse( ts_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,1),20 ) ) ) )

results.idea: News sentiment momentum: positive sentiment acceleration predicts price gains
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine sentiment score and short returns. SUGGESTION2: if sentiment vector exists apply vec_sum. SUGGESTION3: backfill sentiment. SUGGESTION4: sentiment fields vary in coverage. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Price channel mean-reversion: deviation from 50-day high/low
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine current price vs rolling max/min. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill highs/lows if sparse. SUGGESTION4: price high userCount. Confidence 0.61.
results.implementation: quantile( subtract( PRICE, divide( add( ts_max(PRICE,50), ts_min(PRICE,50) ), 2 ) ) )

results.idea: Momentum rotated by sector strength (sector-neutralized momentum)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum and sector group neutralization. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill group if sparse. SUGGESTION4: momentum field high userCount. Note: GROUP fields must be used as group parameter per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Earnings-season momentum fade: post-earnings reversal in high-vol names
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine EARNINGS_SURPRISE and volatility. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill surprises. SUGGESTION4: earnings fields mixed coverage. Confidence 0.49.
results.implementation: quantile( multiply( reverse( EARNINGS_SURPRISE ), ts_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,1),30 ) ) )

results.idea: Liquidity-adjusted value: favor low-price-impact value stocks
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine valuation metric and liquidity. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill liquidity if sparse. SUGGESTION4: use PE and turnover with good coverage. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Cross-sectional correlation breakdown: stocks decoupling from market may mean-revert
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_corr between stock returns and market returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill if sparse. SUGGESTION4: correlation fields less used but useful. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Short-term pair strategy: divergence between two correlated names
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_returns of pair constituents. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: returns widely available. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum persistence via ts_ir: high information ratio in recent window
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_ir on returns per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: ts_ir requires sufficient history. Confidence 0.69 — IR is strong persistence indicator.

results.idea: Volume spike reversal: sharp volume spike with price drop predicts bounce
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine volume spike and recent drop. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill volume. SUGGESTION4: volume fields high userCount. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Intraday range persistence: rising daily range predicts continuation
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine intraday range vector avg and short returns. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_avg on intraday vector. SUGGESTION3: backfill intraday if sparse. SUGGESTION4: intraday vectors lower userCount. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by analyst sentiment: buy momentum where analyst sentiment improving
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine sentiment delta and returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill sentiment. SUGGESTION4: sentiment coverage varies. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term reversal with ts_rank: rank 3-day returns and short extremes
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_rank on short returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns where necessary. SUGGESTION4: returns highly available. Confidence 0.65 — short-run reversal robust.

results.idea: Volatility skew mean-reversion: extreme skew predicts reversion
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine skew proxy and recent returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill skew. SUGGESTION4: option-derived skew sparse. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorization: winsorize returns before cross-sectional rank
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply winsorize then quantile per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: winsorize helps outliers. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Fundamental momentum: accelerating ROE combined with price momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine ROE change and returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill ROE if sparse. SUGGESTION4: fundamentals lower frequency. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Cross-sectional ranking by return/volatility z-score
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine zscore and divide per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns/vol. SUGGESTION4: use common fields. Confidence 0.7.
results.implementation: quantile( zscore( divide( ts_returns(PRICE,20), ts_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,1),20 ) ) ) )

results.idea: Momentum persistence via ts_decay_linear (turnover control)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_decay_linear on momentum to control turnover. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: choose returns with high userCount. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Price-to-book re-rating combined with momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine PB and returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill PB if sparse. SUGGESTION4: PB widely available. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Cross-sectional ts_quantile on returns to Gaussianize heavy tails
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_quantile on returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill if needed. SUGGESTION4: ts_quantile mitigates outliers. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by days_from_last_change in fundamental data
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine days_from_last_change(FUNDAMENTAL) with returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill fundamental. SUGGESTION4: helps avoid stale fundamentals. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Short-term reversal using ts_arg_max: recent local extremes mean-revert
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_arg_max on short returns per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: short-run signal moderate confidence. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum combined with group neutralization by market cap bucket
results.description: SUGGESTION1: group_neutralize(momentum, MCAP_BUCKET) to avoid size bias. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill group buckets. SUGGESTION4: market cap grouping common. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Realized skew momentum: recent asymmetry in returns predicts direction
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_kurtosis or skew proxy with returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill if needed. SUGGESTION4: higher moment signals lower confidence. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Momentum combined with inverse group volatility scaling
results.description: SUGGESTION1: scale momentum by group_std_dev to reduce sector risk. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill group std dev. SUGGESTION4: group operators used as group parameter per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Confidence 0.64.
results.implementation: divide( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), group_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,20), SECTOR_GROUP ) )

results.idea: Momentum filtered by days-from-last-price-change (avoid stale movers)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine ts_returns and days_from_last_change. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill days_from_last_change if sparse. SUGGESTION4: minor filter improves signal. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized earnings surprises
results.description: SUGGESTION1: winsorize earnings surprise then combine with returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill earnings surprise. SUGGESTION4: winsorize to control outliers. Confidence 0.59.
results.implementation: quantile( multiply( ts_returns(PRICE,10), winsorize( EARNINGS_SURPRISE, std=4 ) ) )

results.idea: Short-term correlation divergence: stocks losing correlation to peers may revert
results.description: SUGGESTION1: compute ts_corr with peer basket and reverse high divergence. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill peer returns. SUGGESTION4: peer basket selection matters. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Price acceleration: second derivative of price (ts_delta of returns)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_delta on ts_returns to capture acceleration. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: simple and broadly applicable. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum combined with analyst target price upside
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine target price upside and returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill target price. SUGGESTION4: target price coverage moderate. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Cross-sectional ranking by recent drawdown recovery
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_max_diff to measure distance from recent highs and prefer recoveries. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill price history. SUGGESTION4: price high availability. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_zscore to reduce outlier influence
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply ts_zscore on returns per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns when needed. SUGGESTION4: ts_zscore reduces drawdown risk. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Liquidity breakout: rising volume and rising price as buy signal
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply volume surge and positive return. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill volume. SUGGESTION4: volume fields high userCount. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum vs fundamentals divergence: momentum despite deteriorating fundamentals
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine ts_returns and fundamental delta; prefer discrepancies. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill fundamentals. SUGGESTION4: reduces risk of momentum in deteriorating names. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Inverse volatility carry: sell high implied volatility with low realized vol
results.description: SUGGESTION1: compare IMPLIED_VOL and realized vol. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill IV. SUGGESTION4: option data sparser -> lower confidence. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Momentum with tail trimming using tail operator
results.description: SUGGESTION1: winsorize with tail to remove extreme small/big values then rank. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: tail helps stability. Confidence 0.66.
results.implementation: quantile( tail( ts_returns(PRICE,20), lower=-0.2, upper=0.2, newval=0 ) )

results.idea: Momentum combined with sector group z-score normalization
results.description: SUGGESTION1: group_zscore(momentum, SECTOR_GROUP) to remove sector biases. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill groups as needed. SUGGESTION4: group operators used properly as group param. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Trailing stop signal: use hump operator to limit turnover and capture trends
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply hump to momentum vector per SUGGESTION1. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: hump reduces trading costs. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Mean-reversion using ts_av_diff: deviation from time-series mean
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_av_diff gives clean deviation handling NaNs. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill price. SUGGESTION4: robust to missing data. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum alternating by ts_arg_min: identify local troughs as buys
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_arg_min on returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: local minima often precede rebounds. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum combined with group_count to favor well-populated sectors
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply momentum by group_count to prefer liquid sectors. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill group counts. SUGGESTION4: group operators used as group param. Confidence 0.53.
results.implementation: multiply( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), group_count( PRICE, SECTOR_GROUP ) )

results.idea: Momentum scaled by inverse of vec_stddev (for vector features)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: if vector feature available, use vec_stddev to scale. SUGGESTION2: applied vec_stddev. SUGGESTION3: backfill vector. SUGGESTION4: vector fields lower coverage but informative. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Price momentum with ts_scale to normalize temporal dynamics
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply ts_scale to returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: ts_scale reduces nonstationarity. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum with inverse days_from_last_change in price to avoid stale names
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum and days_from_last_change. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill days counter. SUGGESTION4: minor filter. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by group_mean to remove group-level drift
results.description: SUGGESTION1: subtract group_mean(momentum, GROUP) to neutralize group move. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill group. SUGGESTION4: group_mean used as group param per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Confidence 0.66.
results.implementation: subtract( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), group_mean( ts_returns(PRICE,20), SECTOR_GROUP ) )

results.idea: Momentum with ts_product of positive returns (strong trending names)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_product on short returns picks persistent uptrends. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: captures compounded short-run gains. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum combined with group_rank to pick leaders in each sector
results.description: SUGGESTION1: group_rank(momentum, SECTOR_GROUP) selects intra-group winners. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill groups. SUGGESTION4: group operators used as group param. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum sign persistence: use sign of multi-day returns to filter noise
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply sign(ts_sum(returns, N)) to detect consistent direction. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: simple filter reduces false signals. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum with inverse group_scale to avoid overcrowded groups
results.description: SUGGESTION1: divide momentum by group_scale to penalize groups with compressed ranges. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill group. SUGGESTION4: group_scale used properly. Confidence 0.54.
results.implementation: divide( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), group_scale( ts_returns(PRICE,20), SECTOR_GROUP ) )

results.idea: Momentum using ts_rank of ts_ir to favor names with persistent high IR
results.description: SUGGESTION1: rank ts_ir scores cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: ts_ir historically predictive. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_mean reversion filter: only trade if recent return > mean
results.description: SUGGESTION1: compare recent returns to longer-term mean. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: simple thresholding applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_std_dev threshold: avoid names with extreme intraday noise
results.description: SUGGESTION1: filter momentum by recent short-term stddev. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill vol. SUGGESTION4: reduces false breakouts. Confidence 0.63.
results.implementation: trade_when( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), less( ts_std_dev( ts_returns(PRICE,1),5 ), 0.05 ), NaN )

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by ts_regression beta significance to market
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_regression to pick stocks with significant positive alpha relative to market. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: regression adds robustness. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_count_nans to avoid names with sparse data
results.description: SUGGESTION1: penalize alphas where recent data contains many NaNs. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill may be applied but prefer exclusion. SUGGESTION4: improves stability. Confidence 0.6.
results.implementation: trade_when( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), less( ts_count_nans( PRICE, 20 ), 5 ), NaN )

results.idea: Momentum with inverse price-to-sales to favor cheap momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine PS ratio with returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill PS. SUGGESTION4: value + momentum has empirical support. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum using ts_quantile with cauchy driver to emphasize tails
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use ts_quantile with cauchy to accentuate extreme recent moves. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: driver choice affects aggressiveness. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum combined with group_backfill to improve coverage within groups
results.description: SUGGESTION1: use group_backfill to fill gaps before ranking. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: group_backfill applied when coverage low. SUGGESTION4: helps unstable datasets. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_max_diff filter to avoid names near 52-week highs
results.description: SUGGESTION1: penalize names close to recent highs using ts_max_diff. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill price history. SUGGESTION4: reduces crowed-high risk. Confidence 0.57.
results.implementation: trade_when( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), greater( ts_max_diff(PRICE,252), 0.1 ), NaN )

results.idea: Momentum with ts_scale followed by normalize to remove cross-section mean
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_scale then normalize aids stability. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: helps remove temporal and cross-sectional biases. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Momentum signal combining short and medium-term trends (dual-horizon)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: subtract medium-term returns from short-term to capture acceleration. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: dual-horizon robust to noise. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by ts_kurtosis to avoid names with fat-tailed returns
results.description: SUGGESTION1: penalize names with high ts_kurtosis. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: reduces tail risk. Confidence 0.61.
results.implementation: trade_when( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), less( ts_kurtosis( ts_returns(PRICE,20), 20 ), 5 ), NaN )

results.idea: Momentum using signed_power to overweight strong positive movers
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply signed_power(momentum,1.5) to accentuate large signals. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: increases aggression. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum with inverse price volatility using inverse(ts_std_dev)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: divide momentum by recent vol to prefer stable movers. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill vol. SUGGESTION4: improves risk-adjusted returns. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum combined with weekday seasonality filter
results.description: SUGGESTION1: prefer momentum on days with historically stronger returns (e.g., Monday effect). SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill calendar effects. SUGGESTION4: seasonality small edge. Confidence 0.42.
results.implementation: trade_when( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), equal( ts_step(1)%7, 1 ), NaN )

results.idea: Momentum enhanced by ts_target_tvr_decay to control turnover to target
results.description: SUGGESTION1: apply ts_target_tvr_decay to momentum to keep turnover manageable. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: practical for portfolio implementation. Confidence 0.65.
results.implementation: ts_target_tvr_decay( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), lambda_min=0, lambda_max=1, target_tvr=0.1 )

results.idea: Momentum with inverse float-adjusted market cap to favor small-cap momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1: multiply momentum by inverse( FLOAT_MCAP ) to tilt small caps. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill mcap. SUGGESTION4: size tilt increases returns but also risk. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum using quantile of combined momentum and quality metric
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine momentum and quality (e.g., gross margin) then quantile. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill fundamentals. SUGGESTION4: momentum+quality tends to improve durability. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by recent earning calls positive mentions (sentiment)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine call sentiment delta and returns. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill sentiment. SUGGESTION4: signal depends on coverage. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorize + scale to control outliers and volatility
results.description: SUGGESTION1: winsorize returns then ts_scale. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: backfill returns. SUGGESTION4: robust preproc. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum combined with group_cartesian_product to create refined groups (e.g., sector x size)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: create combined group to neutralize finer buckets. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ensure groups available. SUGGESTION4: useful for granularity but increases complexity. Confidence 0.55.
results.implementation: group_neutralize( quantile( ts_returns(PRICE,20) ), group_cartesian_product( SECTOR_GROUP, SIZE_GROUP ) )
